column4: How can I make ubuntu recognize that my sata HDD is sata and not PATA
is the PATA setting set in your bios for SATA? that's the only way way ubuntu will recogie a drive as PATA if it is an sata if that option is set in the bios
there is no PATA setting in my bios
is there any other way because there isn't a PATA/SATA option on this netbook's bios
